item.title: E-scooter positioning in urban environments
item.description: Information Link to heading Chair/professorship: Geosensors and Engineering Geodesy (GSEG) Supervisor: Prof. Dr. Andreas Wieser Advisor: Matej Varga Suitable for: BSc/Mc/Master project Number of students per group: 1-4 Maximum number of groups 1 Abstract Link to heading E-scooters in cities rely on sensors for positioning which can only provide 3-10 meters accuracy. Many applications require sub-meter accuracy in real time. Installing expensive, high-quality hardware on large number of e-scooters is costly and impractical.
